Description: Secure Multi-Region Infrastructure for HIPAA/PCI DSS Compliant Web Application

Environment.Description: Environment name for resource tagging and configuration

WebInstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for web servers

SSLCertificateArn.Description: ARN of SSL certificate in ACM

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to instances. Leave empty if no SSH access is needed.

DBMasterPasswordParameter.Description: SSM Parameter Store path for database master password. Leave empty to use default password.

GlobalClusterIdentifier.Description: Global cluster identifier for Aurora Global Database. Leave empty to use auto-generated name.

LambdaCodeS3Bucket.Description: S3 bucket containing Lambda function code

LambdaCodeS3Key.Description: S3 key for Lambda function code

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix for resource naming and isolation

UseExistingS3Bucket.Description: Existing S3 bucket name to use. Leave empty to create new bucket.

UseExistingKMSKeyId.Description: Existing KMS key ARN to use. Leave empty to create new key.

UseExistingGlobalCluster.Description: Existing global cluster identifier to use. Leave empty to create new cluster.

UseExistingALB.Description: Existing Application Load Balancer ARN to use. Leave empty to create new ALB.

UseExistingNatGateway1EIP.Description: Existing EIP allocation ID for NAT Gateway 1. Leave empty to create new EIP.

UseExistingNatGateway2EIP.Description: Existing EIP allocation ID for NAT Gateway 2. Leave empty to create new EIP.

SkipRDSInstances.Description: Skip creation of RDS DB instances if user lacks permissions

EnableGreenFleet.Description: Enable creation of green ASG for blue/green with weighted ALB forwarding

BlueTrafficWeight.Description: Weight percentage for blue target group

GreenTrafficWeight.Description: Weight percentage for green target group

GreenMinSize.Description: Green ASG minimum size when green fleet is enabled

GreenMaxSize.Description: Green ASG maximum size when green fleet is enabled

GreenDesiredCapacity.Description: Green ASG desired capacity when green fleet is enabled

EnableCodeDeploy.Description: Enable CodeDeploy blue/green canary for EC2/OnPrem via custom resource

CanaryStepPercentage.Description: Initial traffic percentage to shift to green during canary

CanaryBakeTimeMins.Description: Bake time (minutes) before shifting remaining traffic

HostedZoneId.Description: Hosted Zone ID for Route 53 records

RecordName.Description: Record name (e.g., app.example.com) for primary/secondary failover

UseExistingALBDNSName.Description: Existing ALB/NLB DNS name to alias when UseExistingALB is set

UseExistingALBHostedZoneId.Description: Hosted zone ID for existing ALB/NLB to alias when UseExistingALB is set

SecondaryALBDNSName.Description: Secondary region ALB/NLB DNS name for failover

SecondaryALBHostedZoneId.Description: Secondary region ALB/NLB hosted zone ID for failover

EnableLambdaProvisionedConcurrency.Description: Enable provisioned concurrency on the example Lambda alias

LambdaProvisionedConcurrency.Description: Provisioned concurrency units for the example Lambda alias

EnableCloudTrail.Description: Enable AWS CloudTrail with KMS encryption (primary region only)

Properties.Description: KMS Key for HIPAA/PCI DSS Compliant Infrastructure

Statement.Sid: Allow EC2/EBS to use the key for EBS encryption
Allow EC2 in this account via service to use key

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Application Load Balancer

Alarm when ASG CPU utilization is low
